scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/icon && sass --style compressed src/scss/custom.scss:dist/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp node_modules/lz-string/libs/lz-string.min.js dist/js/lz-string.min.js && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/js/main.js dist/js/ && cp -r src/icon/* dist/icon/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp src/robots.txt dist/ && cp src/sitemap.xml dist/ && cp src/ads.txt dist/ && cp src/404.html dist/
scripts.setup:certs: mkdir -p certs; mkcert -cert-file certs/cert.pem -key-file certs/cert.key localhost 127.0.0.1
